title: Mental Health Programs for Gun Violence Prevention
subject: appropriations
subject index

abstracts.abstract:
Mental Health Programs for Gun Violence Prevention;  Requiring IMPACT GNV of the City of Gainesville, in collaboration with certain entities, to develop and implement the Gun Violence Prevention Pilot Program; providing alternatives to incarceration for specified youth; requiring the City of Gainesville, in collaboration with Alachua County, to annually submit a specified report to IMPACT GNV by a specified date, etc.
    
        APPROPRIATION:
        $500,000
